body:
"Backports" the git-version-info-patch to 3.9.0 and 3.10.0, since they are still used a lot.

Also adds a patch for not linking against clang runtime libs in hip::host exported target, which was considered a mistake: https://github.com/ROCm-Developer-Tools/HIP/pull/2219
title: add patch for not linking to clang rt bulitin lib, and apply patches to 3.9.0 too
